title: Living With Slime
description:
Fujiwara has been having misfortune in live for long time. At the time he back home from work like usual, suddenly a girl greet him at his house. It turn out that girl actually his new neighborhood and a slime at the same time. For the past 3 months since he meet her, now he already getting used with life with slime. One day she make confession him. What will Fujiwara do?

Tags: absorption, clone, threesome, tentacles, story arc, sole female, sole male, bondage, futanari, nakadashi, femdom, monster girl, snuff, transformation, slime girl, possession, mind control, harem
